entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7 except minus 12 near the Saskatchewan border.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7 except minus 12 near the Saskatchewan border. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15 except minus 20 near the Saskatchewan border.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 15 except minus 20 near the Saskatchewan border. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023
